summary: Infrastructure & database engineering for large-scale financial platforms.
bullets: Built a developer portal used by hundreds of microservices to manage databases.
Orchestrated large-scale cloud migration from AWS to Alicloud.
Led self-service database upgrades, migrating 300+ Redis instances with minimal downtime in under 3 months.
Deployed and maintained highly-available PostgreSQL clusters across 100+ databases.
Automated infra deployments (Kafka, Redis, Consul) with Terraform + Ansible cutting setup time from days to hours.
Provisioned pilot infrastructure project using Terraform and Ansible, adopting Infrastructure as Code practices.

summary: Backend development for multi-region event systems.
bullets: Developed multi-region backend systems for in-game web events, supporting 200K+ participants and 10K+ daily logins within 2 weeks.

summary: Backend engineering on national-scale government website.
bullets: Introduced unit testing on a national-scale government website, increasing coverage to 20% of the codebase.

summary: Created event registration website for national university entrance examination.
bullets: Automated end-to-end user registration process from e-certificate creation to email delivery.
Manage small team of 4 under tight schedules, staying within deadlines for 100% of the features.

summary: Occasional contributions to tooling and infrastructure repos.
